amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to ensure that parenting classes are made available to prisoners with limited English proficiency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Ms. Meng.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
